label: Task Statement 2.3: Describe AWS infrastructure and technologies for building generative AI applications.

link.description: AWS provides a robust, secure, and scalable ecosystem for building generative AI applications through services like Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and Kendra. These services lower the barrier to entry with no-code tools, pre-trained models, and seamless integration into the broader AWS infrastructure. Businesses benefit from faster development cycles, cost-effective scaling, enterprise-grade security, and built-in compliance. However, cost-performance tradeoffs must be carefully managedâ€”factors like responsiveness, regional deployment, and token-based pricing impact total cost. Overall, AWS enables rapid, responsible innovation in GenAI while offering the flexibility and control needed for production-grade applications.
